SEARCH
Module org.example.cab302_project

Package org.example.cab302_project

package org.example.cab302_project
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DatabaseConnection
    This class manages the database connection and ensures that there is only one instance of the database connection being used throughout the application
    EditIngredientController
    A controller class for adding an assortment of functionality to the 'Edit Ingredients' GUI/View Such as the functionality for minimum quantity, quick access settings.
    EditRecipeController
    A Controller class for the Edit recipe View This class handles the logic for the interactions between the recipe ingredients, allowing users to add, update and remove ingredients from a recipe.
    Ingredient
    Represents an Ingredient within the system with attributes such as an ID, name, quantity, minimum quantity and quick access status
    IngredientsDAO
    This is a Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing the ingredients in the database and tables This DAO provides crud methods to create read update and delete from the database
    IngredientTrackerApplication
    The main application class for the ingredient Tracker application This class extends the JavaFX Views, and serves as the entry point for the GUI and the program.
    LoginController
    Controller class for handling the login and registration logic in the Ingredient Tracker Application Interacts with UserDAO to authenticate users and register new users Manages the navigation to the menu view after a login is successful
    ManageIngredientsController
    The Controller class responsible for the logic related to managing ingredients in the Ingredient Tracker Applcation Provides CRUD functionality for the creating,reading, editing, and deleting ingredients.
    ManageRecipesController
    Controller Class which handles the logic for managing recipes in the ingredient Tracker application Provides CRUD functionality for the creating,reading, editing, and deleting recipes .
    MenuController
    The controller class which manages the main menu view for the ingredient tracker app.
    NewIngredientController
    Controller class for handling the logic relating to the addition of new ingredients in the ingredient tracker application This class interacts with the IngredientsDAO for database operations, and updates the parent controllers when a new ingredient is added
    NewRecipeController
    Controller Class which handles the creation of a new recipe which provides CRUD methods to add, edit and delete ingredients within a recipe
    Recipe
    Represents recipes in the application, each recipe has an ID, name and a list of ingredients
    RecipeDAO
    Data Access Object class for managing recipes and recipe ingredients in the database Provides CRUD methods to insert, retrieve, update and delete recipes and their associated ingredients
    RecipieIngredients
    Represents an ingredient which is used in a Recipe in.
    RecommendRecipeController
    Contains the logic for code written within the recommend recipe view
    ShoppingListController
    The controller class which contains the logic for managing the shopping list within the ingredient tracker application This contains CRUD methods to create, read update and delete ingredients in the shopping list and interacts with the database through the IngredientsDAO and ShoppingListDAO classes
    ShoppingListDAO
    This Data Access Object class is responsible for managing shopping lists in the database with CRUD methods to create, read update and delete lists and their ingredients
    ShoppingListItem
    The item or ingredient representation from the shopping list, which consists of an ingredient and its quantity
    User
    represents a user in the system with an ID, username and password hash
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object class for managing the user operations in the database which is inclusive of the registration and authentication as well as password management
